about_the_game:
If you're planning a Victorian or Steampunk based game, then the industrial assets pack from amazing artist Eyefly, is a great place to start. Focusing on the industrial era, the pack contains ornate platforms, walls, walkways, brass vats, wild machines and much, much more.

What's more, a number of the assets are animated, so you can fill your world full of pumps, pistons, switches and loads more!

You can easily build factory interiors, create complex walkways and link multiple levels. Build mighty pipe networks and attach animated cogs, valves and other props to really bring your industrial dream to life.

Once again, these assets are custom-made, GameGuru MAX-ready and slot quickly into your level.

Although designed with Steampunk and Victorian England in mind, these assets can be used in multiple genres, including Modern Day, Horror, Cyberpunk or Alternative Future/Past games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.i
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
